snippet: Mr. Bloomberg, a billionaire with a long-term interest in public health, said he would give Planned Parenthood Federation of America a $250,000 matching gift.
abstract: Mr. Bloomberg, a billionaire with a long-term interest in public health, said he would give Planned Parenthood Federation of America a $250,000 matching gift.

byline.original: By MICHAEL PAULSON and KATE TAYLOR

lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, responding to the controversy over a breast cancer advocacy group that cut off most of its grants to Planned Parenthood for breast cancer screening, said Thursday that he would make up a large part of the missing money.

headline.main: Mayor to Give $250,000 to Planned Parenthood

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure
